description.en:
﻿Mindexnew is the new version of a project that began in 2017, as a Litecoin fork. After a few market adjustments, and the development of its own blockchain, MICN returns in 2021 as a token hosted by the TRON network.
﻿
This proposal offers better cost-effectiveness, as well as the agility of the TRON operating system, which is fully decentralized and based on blockchain. Now, Mindexnew has the benefits of high scalability, better performance, and the capacity of supporting a great number of users.
